text: Yevgeny Ivanovich Shaposhnikov (; 3 February 1942 – 8 December 2020) was a Soviet and Russian military leader and politician. He was born in Rostov Oblast, Soviet Union. Shaposhnikov was Minister of Defence between 1991 and 1992. Shaposhnikov died on 8 December 2020 in Moscow from COVID-19 at the age of 78.Умер последний министр обороны СССР Евгений Шапошников ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ministers of Defence of Russia Category:Russian military people Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Rostov Oblast
title: Yevgeny Shaposhnikov
